ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: Taking this class is a joy. The books are, on the whole, very enjoyable to read, and the depth of analysis that you will reach in seminar is astounding. Professor Marcus is an incredible teacher: her passion for the subject matter, her brilliant insights, and the liveliness of the class discussions will really make these books come alive. The weekly presentations take a lot of work, so read closely and plan concise comments in advance. Still, the 13 class meetings will go quickly, so enjoy every moment. If you put a lot into this class, the payoff is tremendous.
Yes, I would recommend it because it offers a very deep knowledge on the major issues regarding the study of the Twentieth Century Italian Literature.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: The class helped me to have a better perspective on the issues relating to the Italian novel and the Italian Twentieth Century Literature.
